short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates secure passwords with 2FA codes and copies them to the clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Secure Password + 2FA Generator
Easily generate and manage secure passwords combined with Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) codes for improved security. This extension helps you quickly generate strong passwords, attach a time-based OTP (TOTP) code to it, and copy both directly to your clipboard.

Features:

Generate a secure password combined with 2FA for enhanced protection.
Automatically copy the password + OTP to your clipboard with a single click.
Store and manage multiple password + 2FA combos securely.
Easily add, view, and delete your saved combos.
Simple, clean interface with a focus on ease of use and privacy.
Why Use Secure Password + 2FA Generator? Using strong, unique passwords combined with 2FA significantly enhances your security. This extension simplifies the process, making it effortless to generate, store, and use password + 2FA combos whenever you need them.

Security Notice: Your passwords and secret codes are safely stored locally within your browser's storage, ensuring that your sensitive data never leaves your device.
